word: 10 (Philippians 2:5). Adorning the Doctrine of Christ.--To adorn the doctrine of Christ our Saviour, we must have the same mind which was in Christ. Our likes and dislikes, our desire to favor self to the disadvantage of others must be overcome. Let the peace of God rule in your hearts. Christ must be in us a living, working power (MS 39, 1896).
